description:
The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Light the Fire of Shandora! Wyper, the Warrior!
Ranimons la flamme de Shandora ! Wiper le guerrier
Shandra no Hi o Tomose! Senshi Wiper
จงสุมไฟแห่งแชนดร้า! ยอดนักรบไวเปอร์
シャンドラの灯を燈せ! 戦士ワイパー
